page.title: 13SECTION 5 & SECTION 6
page.content:
LAND COVER - 0l = l farm, l hotel, l guest house (bed & breakfast), l house converted into 9 flats; 2 holiday cottages; 3 owner occupied ll = Intensively managed grassland; l2 = enclosed rough grazing AMENITIES - 0l = l2, 02 = ll, 67 = Bus service Penrith to Patterdale
SECTION 6 - WEST SHORE OF ULLSWATER COMMUNICATIONS - Post box at Rampsbeck ECOLOGY - Foothpath along lakeside LAND COVER - l9 = Lake Ullswater ll = Intensively managed grassland l4 = Rumney's Plantation mainly deciduous trees. AMENITIES - 0l = ll. 02 = l9. 03 = 0l l hotel, 6 houses: l for holiday let. Privately owned boathouse. 38 = Ullswater Marine Sailing School
